User guide¶

How the end user can use the API

webApi.checkAccess(deviceId=None, memberId=None, serialNumber=None)¶

Return if user has access to current device

Args:
deviceId (int): The ID of the device memberId (int): The ID of the member serialNumber (string) : the Serial number on the badge
Returns:

JSON The return code:

{status: true, message: "Success" } -- Success!
{status: false, message: "fail reason" } -- No good.
